author: w0dm4n
body:
# Steps to reproduce

```
Invoke-Command -ComputerName host -Authentication Negotiate -Credential $creds -ScriptBlock {Get-Process}
```

# Expected behavior

```
Connect to the remote server and display processes

```

# Actual behavior

```
A nice [1]    16933 segmentation fault  pwsh

```
